question: The "Kvarken Bridge" is a proposed bridge construction project connecting which two countries?
explanation: Kvarken Bridge is a proposed bridge construction project connecting Finland and Sweden across the Strait of Kvarken and as a part of the European Route(E12). It is a part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site. This bridge will shorten the travel time of 5-6 hours and ensure a ferry connection across the Kvarken.
